title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations       The Geology of Bighorn Canyon is a 12 minute film that gives you an in-depth look at how "The Grandest Canyon in the Northern Rockies" was created. This film was produced in a cooperative effort between the National Park Service and Montana State University.  Click on this link to watch the film at Terra - The Nature of Our World's website
